html: 4.20.21  3:16 am   Do you think you will try an orthographic projection music video in the near future?
4.20.21  3:00 am   is the line "I can see where all the money in the world has gone, it's swimming across the floor in the ocean" about plastic or something
4.20.21  1:50 am   How is your plan for future music videos? Will you alternate 3d and 2d, only use 3d sometimes, or mix them? (Since your newest video is in 2d again)
4.20.21  1:32 am   what universe do your songs exist in?
4.20.21  12:47 am   why am i having so much fun ruining my life

4.20.21  12:31 am   do you think of the main idea for a song then write the lyrics based on it,

      or do you stitch together various lyrics and ideas and try to connect them together?
4.20.21  12:29 am   How would you describe your music videos art style? Preferably in 5 words.
4.20.21  12:11 am   what'd you use to make the video for got some money
4.20.21  12:08 am   aren't all songs just pop in different flavors
4.19.21  11:52 pm   Thoughts on the pasteurization process?
4.19.21  11:41 pm   Why are palm trees relatively common in your videos?
4.19.21  11:31 pm   What's something you've always wanted to do?
4.19.21  11:18 pm   Why does it say "memory" at 1:02 in your newest song?
4.19.21  11:17 pm   How did you magically get so good at animating over the years? Was it practice or did the unicorns come and leave glitter in your brain?
4.19.21  10:55 pm   would you ever consider showing your tools and your process for making a song?
4.19.21  10:31 pm   what's it like to have the name Bill
4.19.21  10:31 pm   are you in any way related to george washington
4.19.21  10:11 pm   Do you think of color theory when you make your videos or do you use colors intuitively

4.19.21  10:06 pm   why are you posting first the video on YouTube and then the song on music streaming platforms after a day or so? I would like to have the option to have both at the same time.

     but don't worry, if it works for you, it's okay
4.19.21  9:39 pm   How would you describe your genre of music?
4.19.21  9:38 pm   what kind of music do you listen to
4.19.21  9:11 pm   Why do you favor writing songs in major keys over minor?
4.19.21  8:57 pm   Do you think the jury made a mistake on the "Blurred Lines" case?
4.19.21  8:44 pm   why is the money swimming across the floor of the ocean?
4.19.21  7:54 pm   How do you find the right mix between wit wisdom, and irony?
4.19.21  7:44 pm   how come you switched from helvetica to arial (yes i could tell, yes i have a problem)
4.19.21  7:34 pm   Hey Bill! When you write songs do you think out the form in advance or do you just start writing and let the parts show up where they do?

4.19.21  7:34 pm   have you received any formal music training?

      and, more importantly, is formal music training worth the paper it's written on?

4.19.21  7:27 pm   Hi Bill, as a musician who struggles with doubt and self esteem, do you ever suffer from those musically?

     And if so how do you overcome them?
4.19.21  7:22 pm   how epic is music?
4.19.21  7:06 pm   how do you feel about earth?
4.19.21  7:04 pm   In your song got some money, you mention that money is bad, why do you think that?
